title: 157: The Intellectual Life
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Even smart people need a little direction sometimes (except for Graeme, who is perfect always), and The Intellectual Life by A.G. Sertillanges helps us all in the disciplines of intellectualism.
